column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Ministry of Health has announced after a decision between the Royal Government
column4: that authorities will use the Great Duke Hotel (formerly the Intercontinental Hotel) as a center for the care and treatment of COVID-19 patients.------In addition
column5: the Ministry of Health will cooperate with the Army Medical Corps and the Police to jointly combat the virus to prevent transmission in the community.------An air shipment of medical supplies will also arrive from China by air this evening. It is reported to be enough for 2000 cases.
